name: Attack! Lite
description:
You went to go to the pool. When you got there, however, you noticed that there was a random shark in the water! How does that even happen? You ask yourself. You're parents went to the gym near the pool, unaware of the situation.

Play the tutorial level for a better understanding of the game's controls.

Tap to swim. Press USE to grab onto the edge of the pool. Press USE to grab or throw a toy.

Credits:

Music, graphics, code and sound effects by me
